name: Giant's Club
description: A massive club made from the femur of a giant.
looks: The Giant's Club is a huge, heavy weapon made from a giant's femur. It is covered in crude carvings and has a spiked metal head. The club exudes an aura of power and intimidation.

special_weapon_skils.bludgeoning: Increases damage done with bludgeoning weapons.

special_effects.stun: Has a chance to stun enemies on hit.

name: Iron Sword
description: A sturdy iron sword suitable for close combat.
looks: The iron sword has a straight blade with a sharp edge. The hilt is wrapped in leather for a secure grip.

special_weapon_skills.sword: Grants a bonus to Sword skill when used.

special_effects.bleeding: Has a chance to cause bleeding damage.

name: Firestaff
description: A staff imbued with the power of fire, allowing the wielder to cast powerful fire spells.
looks: The Firestaff is a long staff made of blackened wood, with intricate carvings depicting flames along its length. At the top of the staff is a crystal orb that glows with a fiery essence.

special_weapon_skills.fire_magic: Grants a bonus to Fire Magic skill when wielding the Firestaff.

name: Steel Gauntlets
description: Heavy steel gauntlets that provide excellent protection for the hands.
looks: The gauntlets are made of thick steel plates with reinforced leather straps. They have articulated fingers and a large metal plate on the back of the hand.

name: Iron Sword
description: A basic iron sword, suitable for beginners.
looks: The iron sword has a straight blade with a single edge. The hilt is made of leather wrapped around a wooden core, providing a comfortable grip.

special_weapon_skills.sword: Allows the user to perform sword-specific skills.

name: Sword of the Lion
description: A massive sword adorned with lion motifs, known for its incredible strength and power.
looks: The Sword of the Lion has a long, curved blade made of polished steel. The hilt is wrapped in red leather and features intricate engravings of roaring lions. The pommel is shaped like a lion's head with ruby eyes.

special_weapon_skills.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill when equipped.

special_effects.berserker: Increases damage output when health is below 50%.

name: Excalibur
description: A legendary sword said to have been pulled from a stone by King Arthur.
looks: Excalibur is a beautiful sword with a shining silver blade and a golden hilt. The hilt is adorned with intricate engravings of dragons and knights.

special_weapon_skils.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill when wielded.

special_effects.holy_damage: Deals additional Holy damage on hit.

name: Iron Dagger
description: A small dagger made of iron
looks: The iron dagger has a short blade and a simple, wooden handle. It looks sharp and well-crafted.

name: Golden Dagger
description: A finely crafted dagger made of pure gold.
looks: The golden dagger has a slim and sleek design, with a sharp, pointed blade and an ornate hilt adorned with intricate engravings. The handle is wrapped in soft leather for a comfortable grip.

special_weapon_skills.dagger_skill: Increases damage and accuracy with daggers.

name: Flaming Sword
description: A powerful sword imbued with the element of fire.
looks: The Flaming Sword has a long blade with a fiery glow that flickers and dances along its edge. The hilt is adorned with intricate carvings of flames.

special_weapon_skills.fire_magic: Grants bonus to Fire Magic skill when wielding the sword.

special_effects.burning_strike: Has a chance to inflict burning damage on the target with each strike.

name: Iron Axe
description: A sturdy iron axe designed for chopping wood and cleaving through enemies.
looks: The iron axe has a long wooden handle with a steel blade attached at one end. The blade is curved and sharp, perfect for cutting and splitting wood or dealing heavy damage to foes.

special_weapon_skills.axe_mastery: Increases damage dealt with axes by 10%.

name: Iron Sword
description: A simple iron sword with a sharp blade.
looks: The iron sword has a straight blade with a single cutting edge. The hilt is wrapped in leather for a secure grip.

special_weapon_skils.swordsmanship: Increases damage and accuracy with swords.

name: Iron Axe
description: A sturdy iron axe suitable for chopping wood or hacking through enemies.
looks: The iron axe has a solid iron blade and a wooden handle wrapped in leather for a better grip.

name: Iron Sword
looks: The iron sword has a straight blade with a single edge and a sharp point. The hilt is made of wood and wrapped in leather for a comfortable grip.

name: Fireball Staff
description: A staff infused with the power of fire, allowing the wielder to cast devastating fireball spells.
looks: The Fireball Staff is a long staff made of dark wood, with intricate carvings of flames and runes along its length. At the top of the staff, there is a crystal orb that glows with a fiery light.

special_weapon_skills.fire_magic: Increases the effectiveness of fire spells.

special_effects.fire_damage: Applies burning effect to enemies hit by fireball spells.
